mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_device_config_send (device_id, payload, send_status,create_time, update_time, creator,tenant_id) property_value, ts) VALUES (#{entity.deviceId},#{entity.payload},#{entity.sendStatus},#{entity.createTime},#{entity.updateTime},#{entity.creator},#{entity.tenantId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE payload =VALUES( payload )
,send_status =VALUES(send_status)
,send_status =VALUES(send_status)
,create_time =VALUES(create_time)
,update_time =VALUES(update_time)
